levels.description:
Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>lengthens slightly</>, Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>; each time 1 ammo is consumed, ATK increases by an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@atk:0%}</> (up to a maximum of {attack@max_stack_cnt} stacks); increases the Trait HP recovery effectiveness to <@ba.vup>{trait_ratio}</> times; when the skill ends, deals <@ba.vup>{attack@final_atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Physical damage to all enemies attacked while the skill is active
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {attack@trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
